overview:
Runar Eidsaa is the founder of the investment company www.ignitas.com
He has over the last 15 years been involved with a broad range of assignments within the telco, media and energy sector focusing on market entry, IT and business strategy. He has previously worked for Price Waterhouse Coopers, PA Consulting, Framtidsfabriken and Hydro.

From 2000 to 2003 he was in charge of Framfabs Oslo office, and with PA Consulting he was in charge of Marketing practice and helped Orange build up their 3G business in Sweden.

Runar is a graduate from NHH and NTNU and today primarily works with our customers on a strategic level.Runar represents Ignitas on the boards of Restplass AS, Meetcon AS and MÃ¸teforum AS
